entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/aws-ia/terraform-aws-eks-blueprints
entry.content: Configure and deploy complete EKS clusters.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
entry.content: Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-config
entry.content: This module configures AWS Config, a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-alb-service-task
entry.content: Terraform module which implements an ECS service which exposes a web service via ALB.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-efs
entry.content: Terraform Module to define an EFS Filesystem (aka NFS)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-memcached
entry.content: Terraform Module for ElastiCache Memcached Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sns-lambda-notify-slack
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a lambda function that subscribes to SNS and notifies to Slack.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sso
entry.content: Terraform module to configure AWS Single Sign-On (SSO)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
entry.content: Terraform module to configure and provision Datadog monitors, custom RBAC roles with permissions, Datadog synthetic tests, Datadog child organizations, and other Datadog resources from a YAML configuration, complete with automated tests.

entry.title: https://github.com/github-aws-runners/terraform-aws-github-runner
entry.content: Terraform module for scalable GitHub action runners on AWS

entry.title: https://github.com/techiescamp/devops-projects
entry.content: DevOps Real World Projects for Aspiring DevOps Engineers [Beginner to Advanced]

entry.title: https://github.com/terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-kms
entry.content: Allows managing a keyring, zero or more keys in the keyring, and IAM role bindings on individual keys
